title: The evidence of things not seen, or, Diverse scriptural and philosophical discourses, concerning the state of good and holy men after death ... by that eminently learned divine Moses Amyraldus ; translated out of the French tongue by a Minister of the Church of England.
author: Amyraut, Moïse, 1596-1664.
notes: Translation of: Discours de l'estat des fidèles après la mort.
Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams Library.
